Transform.Script: "" "" "ecmascript:" "function initialize() {" " velocity = new SFVec3f(Math.random() * 0.25 - 0.125, Math.random() * 0.25 - 0.125, Math.random() * 0.25 - 0.125);" "" " scalvel = new SFVec3f(Math.random() * 0.4, Math.random() * 0.4, Math.random() * 0.4);" "}" "" "function set_fraction(value) {" " translation = new SFVec3f(\ttranslation.x + velocity.x, translation.y + velocity.y, translation.z + velocity.z);" " scale = new SFVec3f(scale.x + scalvel.x, scale.y + scalvel.y, scale.z + scalvel.z);" " // if you get to far away or too big, explode" " if ( Math.abs(translation.x) > 256) {" "\ttranslation.x = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" " if ( Math.abs(translation.y) > 256) {" "\ttranslation.y = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" " if ( Math.abs(translation.z) > 256) {" "\ttranslation.z = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" " if (Math.abs(scale.x) > 20) {" "\tscale.x = scale.x/20;" "\ttranslation.x = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" " if (Math.abs(scale.y) > 20) {" "\tscale.y = scale.y/20;" "\ttranslation.y = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" " if (Math.abs(scale.z) > 20) {" "\tscale.z = scale.z/20;" "\ttranslation.z = 0;" "\tinitialize();" " }" "}" "" "\t\t\t" ""
